title: Mark Spatial module classes as experimental
description: The more I dive into this code the more I worry about it, so I think we should give ourselves some leeway to make API changes as part of improvements.

comments.content: I marked all Lucene spatial classes as either @lucene.experimental or @lucene.internal on 4x & trunk branches.  I didn't bother with the test code trees.
comments.author: David Smiley

comments.content: Thanks for doing that David, most appreciated.
comments.author: Chris Male
